permafrost.tundra.org.springframework.web.util

Class OpaqueUriComponents

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.org.springframework.web.util.UriComponents
      • permafrost.tundra.org.springframework.web.util.OpaqueUriComponents
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    final class OpaqueUriComponents
extends UriComponents
    Extension of UriComponents for opaque URIs.
    Since:
    3.2
    See Also:
    Hierarchical vs Opaque URIs
